Package src.ex1

package src.ex1
  • Class
    Description
    Counter
    A class that represents a simple counter with increment functionality.
    CounterMax
    The CounterMax class extends the Counter class and implements the Printable interface to create a counter with a maximum possible value.
    Main
    The program reads numbers from the user, adds them up and prints the sum.
    MainMax
    The program asks the user for a maximum number and the number of numbers he wishes to enter.
    Printable
    The Printable interface is an interface that provides a `print()` method that can be implemented by classes that need to print information to the console or another output stream.
